description:
This comprehensive online course covers the diversity of donors, key search engines, and converting ideas into fundable projects or research. Upon completing the course, you will understand how to navigate the world of grant procurement, identify the key sections of successful proposals, and demonstrate the excellence and innovation that propels your project or research beyond other submissions. You will also understand the diversity of the funding community and how to respond to various guidelines.

You will learn:

  • The fundamentals of grant writing
  • How to present a compelling Need Statement
  • How to navigate the world of grant procurement
  • How to understand proposal writing guidelines
  • How to prepare for the Evaluation Process
  • How to search for Federal, Corporate and Foundation giving opportunities
title: Grant Writing Techniques To Get You Funded!
